DOC.brief_title: Soy Protein Breast Cancer Risk Reduction
DOC.detailed_description: The aim test conduct randomize , double-blind study , two arm 100 woman arm . Premenopausal woman recruit randomly allocate take one two different dietary supplement daily 2 year . The two test diet soy protein drink caseinate protein drink . Multiple blood , urine , breast fluid sample obtain dietary intervention period analyze ovarian hormone . At baseline intervention period , breast density assess radiological technique . The efficacy dietary intervention determine compare mean change ovarian steroid dense breast tissue 2 year dietary intervention period two diet group adjustment baseline value individual patient characteristic interest . We predict 2 year soya dietary supplement reduce breast density , explain individual hormonal change .
